input.sentences: the people in the town were very nice .
they were very warm and welcoming towards me .
they wanted to take some pictures .
i had a great time with them .
output.sentences: I visited a new town, and found the people to be really nice.
Even the children were incredibly welcoming, and warm.
A man I met on the bus invited me to his home for dinner.
I took a lot of pictures of his wonderful family.
I had the best time of the whole trip with his hilarious father.
